income.title: Income Tax Calculator
income.description: Comprehensive PAYG tax calculations with all deductions, offsets, and Medicare levy. Features 2024-25 latest tax rates and HECS/HELP calculations.

cgt.title: CGT Calculator
cgt.description: Calculate CGT on property, shares, and investments with 50% discount optimization. Smart holding period analysis with small business concessions.

negativeGearing.title: Negative Gearing
negativeGearing.description: Analyze rental property investments with depreciation and interest deductions. Complete cash flow analysis for true after-tax returns.
